long_description: since 1972, persimmon homes has been creating new communities across britain last year we built over 14,800 new homes, making us one of the largest home builders in the industry we employ over 5,000 people and are one of the top 100 apprenticeship providers in the country we have 29 regional businesses, a brick and tile factory, a fibre optic company that ensures customers have broadband connectivity from day one and a timber manufacturing business we are rated five star by the home builders federation we are an official partner of team gb, supporting our athletes in the run up to #paris2024 at persimmon, we create vibrant, successful and sustainable communities by: - building good quality, affordable homes- creating good quality, well-paid jobs and apprenticeships- leaving a positive legacy in the communities in which we build
generated_description: persimmon homes is a british home building company that has been operating since 1972. with a focus on creating new communities across the country, persimmon has become one of the largest home builders in the industry, having built over 14,800 new homes in the past year. the company employs over 5,000 people and is recognized as one of top 100 apprenticeship providers in the country. in addition to its residential operations, persimemon also operates 29 regional businesses, a brick and tile factory, a fiber optic company, and a timber manufacturing business. the home builders federation has rated persimmont homes a five-star rating, and the company is an official partner of team gb, supporting athletes in the preparation for the upcoming paris 2024 olympics. persimnon's main goals are to build good quality, affordable homes, provide well-paid jobs and apprenticeships, and leave a positive legacy in the communities they build.
